text: Nanu ama Qhuraan keenik numuk teynal (Nabii Mucammad Jcs kinnuk) wacyih oobisnem sinaamal qajab tekkee?, sinam Yallih digaalak meesiisaay keenik Yallaa kee kay farmoytal yeemene mara diggah usun meqe taamak tatruseenimil sinni Rabbih xaqul meqe galto loonumul ken ayti kumus axcuk kaa rubnem sinaamal qajab tekkee? Yallih farmoyti ama Qhuraan keenil yikriye waqdi koros diggah Mucammad ġzakíķo baab abeynaay usuk luk yemeete Qhuraan baxxaqqa-le baaba iyyen
